Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player is the class, which represents poker player. A player object encapsulates all the most important information of player like:
  • id
  • isInPlay
  • funds
  • hand
Author:
Michał Strzeżoń

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(int id)
    Creates player with id and 50 funds.
